components.name: backend-execution
components.rubric_notes: Core lesson generation/adaptation flows ship with validation and tests; SSE streaming still unmet so not beyond integrated stage.

components.name: backend-research
components.rubric_notes: Happy path implemented but lacks automated tests and throttling; relies on manual QA.

components.name: backend-tutorials
components.rubric_notes: Tutorial CRUD, validation, and publication flows in place with unit tests; lacking full end-to-end coverage.

components.name: backend-assessments
components.rubric_notes: Assessment APIs validated but explanations/analytics incomplete and tests focus on logic layer only.

components.name: web-app
components.rubric_notes: Generate and research flows wired with client hooks; automation coverage missing for critical journeys.

components.name: pkg-alain-kit
components.rubric_notes: Provides orchestration primitives but still uses loose types and lacks automation for docs/status sync.

components.name: alain-kit-sdk
components.rubric_notes: CLI exists but flags and structured logs need expansion per PRD; add examples and tests.

components.name: backend-export
components.rubric_notes: Scaffolding for export present; streaming /export endpoint not implemented.

components.name: repo-ci
components.rubric_notes: Initial workflow added to validate docs/tasks consistency; coverage and test matrix not configured.
